title: Nikola Tesla-Imagination and the Man That Invented the 20th Cen
description:

If you want to learn about one of historyâ€™s most fascinating minds and uncover some of his secrets of imaginationâ€”secrets that enabled him to invent machines light years ahead of his time and literally bring light to the worldâ€”then you want to read this book.
